attributes.action: Reinstate the 45% tax for those who earn over £150,000 and introduce a new level
attributes.additional_details:
To collect more tax from those fortunate to earn more and to support the economy and falling pound.

This hopefully will give confidence back to the people, the world, the economy and support the government with reducing debt.
attributes.background: Reinstate the 45% tax for those that earn £150,000 and implement a new 50% tax for those over £200,000 from April 2023.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that it will not proceed with plans to remove the 45% additional rate of income tax.

We could accept a petition calling for a 50% rate of income tax for people earning over £200,000, but you would need to provide your full name.
